citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The facility representative did not have access records to allow the inspector to review facility records. Exhibitors are
required to allow APHIS Officials to enter the place of business, examine required records, inspect and photograph the
facilities, property and animals as necessary to enforce the Animal welfare Act and Regulations. Provisions shall be
made by the facility to allow APHIS Officials access to facility records during unannounced inspections. Correct by
October 7, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensees mother.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The facility representative did not have access records to allow the inspector to review facility records.  Exhibitors are 
required to allow APHIS Officials to enter the place of business, examine required records, inspect and photograph the 
facilities, property and animals as necessary to enforce the Animal welfare Act and Regulations.  Provisions shall be 
made by the facility to allow APHIS Officials access to facility records during unannounced inspections.   Correct by 
October 7, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensees mother. 
 
 n
